"Partizan":
"A Partizan is a melee weapon with excellent striking speed.

The Class Skill \"Volg Raptor\" only detonates if you can deal enough damage after using it, so the ability to hit hard and fast is important for Partizan users."

"The PA \"Scythe Ripper\" can quickly damage multiple enemies in a wide area.

Charging it will increase its power and range."
